project_name.justification: Americas Gold and Silver Corporation (TSX: USA) (NYSE American: USAS) (“Americas” or the “Company”) is pleased to announce that it has closed the acquisition of the remaining 40% interest in the Galena Complex (“Galena”) in Idaho, USA (the “Transaction”)

company_name.justification: Americas Gold and Silver Corporation (TSX: USA) (NYSE American: USAS) (“Americas” or the “Company”) is pleased to announce that it has closed the acquisition of the remaining 40% interest in the Galena Complex

ceo_buyer.justification: “I would like to thank our shareholders for supporting the acquisition of the remaining 40% interest in the Galena Complex. We are very excited about the transaction as it consolidates an asset with a tremendous team and resource base and positions the Company to benefit in an anticipated strong silver price environment," said Paul Andre Huet, Americas’ Chairman and Chief Executive Officer.
